backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, access control, and quiz question storage with query and update methods for listing and retrieving quizzes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files for documentation or build reference.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file showing configuration for the translation API URL.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining the app theme, dark mode, mobile utilities, and safe-area support.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, profile setup, quiz views, diagnostics, and actor initialization error handling.
frontend/src/components/AdminStatusPanel: Placeholder or empty component file for an admin status panel.
frontend/src/components/AdminTokenReauth: Empty file intended for an admin token reauthentication dialog.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentDiagno: UI panel that displays deployment diagnostics, allows clearing and downloading logs, and runs backend health checks via the actor.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button that logs users in or out using Internet Identity while handling edge cases and UI states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple onboarding form that saves a user's name and triggers completion once submitted.
frontend/src/config/index.ts: Configuration utilities for creating backend actors, resolving canister IDs, determining host, and loading IDL dynamically.
frontend/src/config/translation.ts: Client helper for translating text through a configurable API endpoint with fallback error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches the backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackupRestore.ts: Hook providing logic to export and restore full backend state snapshots with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useExportAllQuestions: Hook that exports all quizzes, their questions, and block metadata, capturing diagnostics on failures.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, logout, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides multiple React Query hooks to fetch and mutate quiz data using an actor, including profiles, quizzes, question counts, and question lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuestionTranslatio: Implements a translation hook with caching, state tracking, and accessors for translating question text from German to English.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuizRecovery.ts: Adds logic to restore questions from one quiz to another using the actor API and invalidates related query caches.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by mounting providers for React Query and Internet Identity and rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/quiz/adaptiveScheduler.ts: Implements an adaptive question scheduler with mastery-based repeats, random first-pass ordering, and spacing rules.
frontend/src/quiz/BackupRestorePanel.tsx: UI component allowing users to export all quiz data to a JSON file or restore data from an uploaded backup file.
frontend/src/quiz/blockUtils.ts: Utility functions for computing 100-question blocks, labels, ranges, and slicing question arrays.
frontend/src/quiz/draftStorage.ts: Handles saving, loading, and clearing localStorage drafts of quiz questions with versioning.
frontend/src/quiz/imageUtils.ts: Helpers for validating JPEG files, reading files to bytes, creating previews, and generating ExternalBlob URLs.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/PdfImportPre: Empty placeholder file for PDF import preview UI.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/pdfImportTyp: Empty placeholder for PDF import type definitions.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/pdfTextExtra: Empty placeholder for PDF text extraction logic.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/questionExtr: Empty placeholder for parsing extracted PDF text into questions.
frontend/src/quiz/QuestionImagePicker.ts: Component for uploading, previewing, validating, and removing JPG images associated with quiz questions.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizEditor.tsx: Main editor UI for managing quiz questions, images, blocks, recovery, exports, and related interactions using various hooks and utilities.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizGameplay.tsx: Main quiz gameplay component handling block selection, adaptive scheduling, translations, answer submission, and feedback UI.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizResults.tsx: Displays final quiz results, score breakdown, and actions to replay or return to editing.
frontend/src/quiz/sessionTypes.ts: Defines question performance tracking and session state structures for quiz sessions.
frontend/src/quiz/TroubleshootingPanel.t: Collapsible panel showing quiz data, counts, and warnings to help debug missing or inconsistent quiz content.
frontend/src/quiz/types.ts: Re-exports Question and QuizId types from the backend.
frontend/src/quiz/validation.ts: Validates quiz questions, checking text, images, answer counts, and correct-answer selection.
frontend/src/utils/actorConnectionInfo.t: Resolves agent host, canister ID, and network by checking env vars, env.json, or URL for IC deployments.
frontend/src/utils/buildStamp.ts: Generates and logs build metadata including timestamp, version, environment, and a session-stable deployment ID.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Collects, stores, and formats deployment-related errors with build and connection metadata for troubleshooting.
frontend/src/utils/quizExport.ts: Exports quiz data to downloadable JSON and generates timestamped filenames for quiz exports.
frontend/src/utils/stateSnapshotJson.ts: Serializes and deserializes full state snapshots, handling ExternalBlob conversion and validating snapshot structure.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL parameters across navigation using URL parsing and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, container rules, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Defines project state, feature requirements, and a known issue about unsaved quiz editor input being lost on navigation.
